Module.name: SISDGEO4

var.name: Version
var.comment: Version

var.name: Config
var.comment: There are a few configuraions possible

var.name: Placement
var.comment: 0=cave, 1=svtt

var.name: Version
var.comment: new version information

var.name: AlphaZ
var.comment: Alpha of the SFLA and other parts

var.name: AlphaZH
var.comment: Alpha of other parts

var.name: SSST_Rmin
var.comment: Minimum Radius of the Small aluminium sector (outside structure)

var.name: SSST_Rmax
var.comment: Maximum Radios of the Small aluminium sector (outside structure)

var.name: SSST_Width
var.comment: Width of the small aluminium sector (outside structure)

var.name: SSST_Pz
var.comment: Additional Z-Position of the aluminium sectors

var.name: SSSS_Rmin
var.comment: Width of the small inner aluminium sector (outside structure)

var.name: SSSS_Width
var.comment: Width of the small inner aluminium sector (outside structure)

var.name: SSRS_Rmin
var.comment: Width of the side of the small rib (outside structure)

var.name: SSLB_Dx
var.comment: Mother volume of the linking box (sector to the cone)

var.name: SSLB_Px
var.comment: X-Position = Y-Position of the mother volume of the linking box

var.name: SSLB_Dy
var.comment: Mother volume of the linking box (sector to the cone)

var.name: SSLB_Dz
var.comment: Mother volume of the linking box (sector to the cone)

var.name: SSBQ_Dx
var.comment: Linking box (sector to the cone)

var.name: SSBQ_Dy
var.comment: Linking box (sector to the cone)

var.name: SSBQ_Dz
var.comment: Linking box (sector to the cone)

var.name: SSCR_ThA
var.comment: Linking cross total thickness (aluminum part)

var.name: SSCR_ThD
var.comment: Linking cross total thickness (DELRIN part)

var.name: SSCR_Wd
var.comment: Linking cross total width

var.name: SSCR_Hl
var.comment: Linking cross horizontal arm full length

var.name: SSCR_Vl
var.comment: Linking cross vertical arm full length

var.name: SSLT_Px
var.comment: X-Position = Y-Position of the linking tube

var.name: SSLT_Rmax
var.comment: Radius of the linking tube (sector to the cone)

var.name: SSLT_Dz
var.comment: Width of the linking tube (sector of the cone)

var.name: SCMP_Dx
var.comment: Width of the mounting plate inserted in the cones

var.name: SCMP_Dy
var.comment: Width of the mounting plate inserted in the cones

var.name: SCMP_Dz
var.comment: Width of the mounting plate inserted in the cones

var.name: SCMP_Px
var.comment: X-Position = Y-Position of the mounting plate

var.name: SCVM_Dz
var.comment: Mother volume of the V-shape piece length

var.name: SCVM_Dx
var.comment: Mother volume of the V-shape piece dx

var.name: SCVM_Px
var.comment: X-Position = Y-Position of the V-Shape piece

var.name: SCVM_Dy
var.comment: Mother volume of the V-Shape piece dy

var.name: SCVM_Pz
var.comment: Z-Position of the mother volume

var.name: SCVB_Dy
var.comment: Height of the base of the V-Shape piece

var.name: SCVS_Dx
var.comment: Dx of the V-plates of the V-shape piece 45 degrees

var.name: SCVS_Dy
var.comment: Medium Height of the V-plates of the V-shape piece 45 degrees

var.name: SCVS_Px
var.comment: x-Position of the V-plates of the V-shape piece 45 degrees

var.name: SCVS_Py
var.comment: x-Position of the V-plates of the V-shape piece 45 degrees

var.name: SFCO_Dx
var.comment: Dx of the connection board (end of the ladder)

var.name: SFCO_Dy
var.comment: Width of the connection board (end of the ladder)

var.name: SFCO_Dz
var.comment: Length of the connection board (end of the ladder)

var.name: SFCO_Px
var.comment: X-Position of the connection board (end of the ladder)

var.name: SFCO_Py
var.comment: Y-Position of the connection board (end of the ladder)

var.name: SFCM_Dx
var.comment: Dx of the second connection board (smaller than the above one!!)

var.name: SFCS_Dz
var.comment: Dx of the small part of the second connection board

var.name: SFKF_Dy
var.comment: Width of the kapton flex circuit between the connection boards

var.name: SFKF_Dz
var.comment: Length of the kapton flex circuit between the connection boards

var.name: SFKF_Dx
var.comment: Dx of the first part of the kapton flex circuit

var.name: SFKF_Px
var.comment: x-Position of the first part of the kapton flex circuit

var.name: SFKF_Py
var.comment: y-Position of the first part of the kapton flex circuit

var.comment: Dx of the second part of the kapton flex circuit

var.comment: Dx of the big part of the second connection board

var.comment: Width of the aluminium plates linking the ladder to the sector

var.comment: Dx = Dz = small part of the aluminium plate linking the ladder

var.name: SFPBDz

var.name: sdlen
var.comment: length of one strip detector (along beam axis)

Block.name: SFMO
Block.comment: is the mother of all Silicon Strip Detector volumes

Module.Block:
dthk = SFPA_smThk + SFPA_gpThk
ang = (SFPA_ladderAngle(ilad)*pi)/180.0 radtilt = (SFPA_ladderTilt(ilad) *pi)/180.0
nc=1
nc=20-ilad+2

Block.name: SFLM
Block.comment: is the mother of the ladder

Block.name: SFDM
Block.comment: is the mother of the detectors

Block.name: SFSW
Block.comment: is a single wafer container

Block.name: SFRA
Block.comment: is the hybrid stiffneer

Block.name: SFRS
Block.comment: two supports of the hybrid stiffneer (piece of it)

Block.name: SFFX
Block.comment: is the flex

Block.name: SFAA
Block.comment: is the A128C chip

Block.name: SFPI
Block.comment: are the pions

Block.name: SFPJ
Block.comment: is the base of the pions

Block.name: SFSD
Block.comment: is the strip detector

Block.name: SFSM
Block.comment: is the mother volume of the ladder (mechanic structure)

Module.Block:
yoffset = -1.7
hight = SFJP_SFSM_Ll*tan(54*pi/180)-SFPB_Hhight/tan(pi/5)-0.02
essai = 180 essai = essai + 27 + 27
wafpckLen=SFPA_wpLen/(SFPA_nssd*1.)

Block.name: SFLT
Block.comment: is (half) the top corner of the triangular ladder skeleton

Block.name: SFLU
Block.comment: is (half) the side corner of the triangular ladder skeleton

Block.name: SFFK
Block.comment: horizontal part of the ladder skeleton carbon base

Block.name: SFFL
Block.comment: titled part of the ladder skeleton carbon base

Block.name: SFKK
Block.comment: horizontal part of the kapton film under the ladder base

Block.name: SFKL
Block.comment: titled part of the kpaton film under the ladder base

Block.name: SFLA
Block.comment: is the long part of the bus cable linking the modules to the connection board

Block.name: SFLB
Block.comment: is the part of the long bus cable on the connection board

Block.name: SFLC
Block.comment: is the part of the long bus cable on the connection board up to the connector

Block.name: SFEB
Block.comment: is the big bus elbow

Block.name: SFES
Block.comment: is the small bus elbow

Block.name: SFAM
Block.comment: is the mother volume of the adc board

Block.name: SFAB
Block.comment: is the big volume of the adc board

Block.name: SFAS
Block.comment: is the small volume of the adc board

Block.name: SAPP
Block.comment: is the mother volume of the adc board appendice

Block.name: SAPC
Block.comment: is the core (Epoxy) of the adc board appendice

Block.name: SAPS
Block.comment: is the side shell (Carbon) of the adc board appendice

Block.name: SAPT
Block.comment: is the top-bottom shell (Carbon) of the adc board appendice

Block.name: SFCO
Block.comment: is the connection board (rectangular with Hirose connectors)

Block.name: SFCM
Block.comment: is the mother volume of the second connection board

Block.name: SFCB
Block.comment: is the big part of the second connection board

Block.name: SFCS
Block.comment: is the big part of the second connection board

Block.name: SFKF
Block.comment: is the first part of the kapton flex circuit

Block.name: SFKS
Block.comment: is the second part of the kapton flex circuit

Block.name: SFPR
Block.comment: is the ladder end inside mechanical part (prism with g10 with half density)

Block.name: SFPB
Block.comment: is the ladder end outside mechanical part (rectangle with g10)

Block.name: SSBS
Block.comment: is the small part of the aluminium plate linking the ladder to the sector

Block.name: SSBB
Block.comment: is the Big part of the aluminium plate linking the ladder to the sector

Block.name: SSST
Block.comment: is the top of the small sector

Block.name: SSSS
Block.comment: is the side of the small sector

Block.name: SSRT
Block.comment: is the top of the side rib

Block.name: SSRS
Block.comment: is the side of the small rib

Block.name: SSLB
Block.comment: is the linking (sector to the cone) box

Block.name: SBCH
Block.comment: is the horizontal branch of the DELRIN cross

Block.name: SBFH
Block.comment: is the horizontal branch of the Alumimium cross

Block.name: SBCV
Block.comment: is the vertical branch of the DELRIN cross

Block.name: SBFV
Block.comment: is the vertical branch of the Alumimium cross

Block.name: SSLT
Block.comment: is the linking (sector to the cone) tube

Block.name: SCMP
Block.comment: is the mounting plate inserted in the cones.

Block.name: SCVM
Block.comment: is the mother volume of the V-shape piece

Block.name: SCVB
Block.comment: is the base plate of the V-shape piece

Block.name: SCVS
Block.comment: is the side plate of the V-shape piece
